'''Radiant Spincrystal 102''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Miraculous Whisper]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located inside the window of [[Rufina]] and [[Flo]]'s house at [[Merusea Village]], [[Beryl Region]], [[Fontaine]].
